abstract: The chief at JPMorgan Chase, Jamie Dimon, received about $19.7 million in total compensation for 2008, down from about $34 million in 2007, Reuters said, citing materials filed with United States regulators ahead of its annual shareholder meeting.
lead_paragraph: The chief at JPMorgan Chase, Jamie Dimon, received about $19.7 million in total compensation for 2008, down from about $34 million in 2007, Reuters said, citing materials filed with United States regulators ahead of its annual shareholder meeting.
